name: A Soldiers Tale
description: In this interactive story game you take control of our protagonist, an unamed soldier. There are decisions you will have to make that effect the outcome of the story. The goal of the game is to make the right choices that will lead you to a positive outcome of this story. All other endings end with negative outcomes. If you make the wrong choices and end with a bad ending, simply go back to previous decisons to find where you went wrong.
